title: Movement Bug
body:
Anyone experiencing a lag like movement bug which will force your character to go back and fourth in a small area even if you're clicking somewhere else?

I thought it was lag at first but then two other teammates were experiencing the same issue which caused us to die unnecessarily because we couldn't move away from the enemy even though we could see them with wards.

Comment down below and up vote this post if you're experiencing the same issues so Riot can see.

Thanks (:

replies.body: Just pathing, really sucks that you can't turn it off.
